My name is Ken Henderson, and I am a full time project manager with a passion for front-end web development and web related technology (you probably got that from the over-sized header above). I recently had the opportunity to combine these 2 passions by starting new job in Richmond Virginia working for a web development company as a project manager. I started this site as a place to blog and share some of my experiences.....if you dont like the site, file a complaint, otherwise enjoy!
